# allowLossyKey | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Foundation ](/documentation/foundation)

- [ StringEncodingDetectionOptionsKey ](/documentation/foundation/stringencodingdetectionoptionskey)

-  allowLossyKey 

Type Property# allowLossyKey

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
static let allowLossyKey: StringEncodingDetectionOptionsKey
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/foundation/stringencodingdetectionoptionskey/allowlossykey#Discussion)

Option specifying whether to allow lossy string conversion. The corresponding value for this key is an `NSNumber` object containing a Boolean value. If `@(NO)`, the a lossy string encoding may not be chosen. By default, this value is `@(YES)`.
